name: Dr.B. K. Goyal Heart Foundation
briefDescription: The Dr. B.K. Goyal Heart Foundation was setup to continue the legacy of unparalleled publicservice carried out by Padma Vibhushan, Dr. BK Goyal.Dr. BK Goyal’s career spans over 50 years in Mumbai, where he was considered the father of Interventional Cardiology in India due to his pioneering work in numerous life saving techniques.He always made himself available to treat and care for patients from all walks of life.The Dr. B.K. Goyal Heart Foundation has proudly launched a number of initiatives such asHands Only CPR– a simple life saving technique, which can be learnt in a single session. Inspired by his legacy, we hope to expand the reach of this program, taking it door to door across all echelons of society.With your distinguished support of our causes and programs, we hope to help and care for the underprivileged, prevent emergencies through awareness campaigns and help save lives through improved patient health.
